qas.question: Who was considered Victoria's best and kindest advisor?
Who did Victoria describe as sensible, kind, and amiable?
Who introduced Albert to Victoria?
What Uncle was Victoria's favorite adviser?
How old was Victoria when she met Albert?
Who introduced Victoria and Albert?
What qualities did Victoria believe Albert posessed when she met him?

answers.text: every quality that could be desired to render me perfectly happy

qas.question: Whom did Queen Victoria consider her "best and kindest adviser"?
Who was Victoria not ready to marry at age 17?
What was Victoria's opinion of Albert's appearance?

answers.text: the most pleasing and delightful exterior

qas.question: Who did Victoria credit for her relationship to Albert?
What did Victoria think of Albert at 17 years of age?

answers.text: He possesses every quality that could be desired to render me perfectly happy

qas.question: What were Albert's best qualities?

answers.text: sensible, so kind, and so good, and so amiable

qas.question: How did Victoria find Albert's looks?

answers.text: most pleasing and delightful exterior and appearance
